original_text: so that another man has sexual relations with her, and this is hidden from her husband and her impurity is undetected (since there is no witness against her and she has not been caught in the act),
korean_text: 한 남자가 그 여자와 동침하였으나 그의 남편의 눈에 숨겨 드러나지 아니하였고 그 여자의 더러워진 일에 증인도 없고 그가 잡히지도 아니하였어도

sentences.original_text: so that another man has sexual relations with her
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 남자가 그녀와 성관계를 갖게 되어

sentences.original_text: and this is hidden from her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이것이 그녀의 남편에게 숨겨져 있고

sentences.original_text: since there is no witness against her
and she has not been caught in the act
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀가 현행범으로 붙잡히지 않았기 때문이다
